phrases: He is going to use that bomb.
I am the only one who can spot the enemy's ambush.
If you are my partner, trust me.
I do not know what the hell to do with this thing.
It may blow up if I mess with it.
I can assure you, for your own safety, it is best to run.
When I see a guy with a grin like yours,
nothing makes my day more than messing up his plans.
Now, on to the next one...
No, do not rely on your eyes.
It is been 103 years since I have been wounded like this.
Stop talking and prepare to die, monster!
No, I am afraid it would bring shame upon the Marzaney Sect
if I were to die at the hands of a mere barshe.
But I do not have any elixirs to heal you.
I am going to spend the last moments of my life with her.
I have decided to die next to an uncouth, boorish, and sarcastic man like you.
I would rather... you did not...
Like I promised, I have come to save you.
When I was a child, lost in the forest, you saved me and showed me the way home.
That we would always be friends.
I came, like I said I would.
I did not let you die alone.
So Leahyah, do not be scared.
I beg you to give them more time.
I needed an elixir to heal the damage the poison did.
I used her body to make it.
The catalyst for the psychic bomb was a living fairy.
And she sacrificed her life to save me.
Kei Matoba, thank you for everything.
I may be returning home in shame instead of dying with honor,
but I learned that there are some good warriors on Earth.
I got it back from O'Neill.
Too expensive to give to a tour guide.
Two three pointers in a row!
No idea what the rules are.
We are not sure that Zelada's really dead.
And this city is filled with villains.
I figured there is more I can do.
You are being treated as a detective?
So I will be staying here for a while.
Tomorrow's going to be an early morning.
Make the slightest move and you are dead.
Chief Zimmer, is there a problem-
Matoba, they tell me you chopped off one of the gang member's arms.
I do not care who it was.
If that alien there rapes a 100-year-old man...
I would be calling you a pervert for the rest of your life!
So if your shit spills out of the toilet bowl,
I will make the alien there clean it up with her tongue!
So, why did you chop off the guy's arm?
His lawyer's going to be overjoyed.
Do not call me an alien.
I will keep that in mind.
You know Gardner down at the prosecutor's office, right?
I will talk to him, but I need a report on my desk by 9:00 AM tomorrow!
Do not even be a minute late!
That goes for you too, alien!
Ask Matoba how to write it!
So that is Roth's successor, huh?
Why is he yelling at me?
It is because you let your guard down!
I did not ask for your help.
I do not know how you can even say that.
Would it kill you to say, thank you?
-In the name of the great god Kizenya... -Kei!
Why are you flirting with her?
This garage belongs to the guys we just cuffed.
It is a little too strange for that.
Does it belong to a Semanian?
I have seen these letters in an old book.
That is all I can read.
What if it is some valuable work of art?
We need to be careful with it.
It looks like a princess or something to me.
I cannot be sure, but it looks like a Semanian woman.
It is a mummy in Semanian clothes, found in a Semanian coffin.
They have a different number of teeth.
I will give her an autopsy if you want, I guess,
but we deal in fresh corpses, not mummies.
You would be better off giving her to an archaeologist, do not you think?
We can send her to a lab when you are done.
I want to know all of that tonight.
Kei, I have been on the clock since this morning.
I am amazed you decided to stay here and work with him.
I think it was temporary insanity.
But once in a while, he is nice and it catches you off guard!
Make sure you do not let him fool you.
I do not really understand, but I will remember that.
You would not believe what happened the first day we met.
He brings me the body of some gang member he just killed,
and then do you know what he says?
Do not steal the change out of his pockets!
I saved his life today, and he said he did not ask for my help!
Next time something happens, I am just going to let him die.
When he dies, why do not we dissect him together?
We can slit open his stomach and take a selfie!
Cecil, you can call me Tilarna, too!
You are sure getting friendly fast.
Dr. Epps, the results of the lab test are in.
There is nothing wrong with being friendly with our clients,
but do not forget to do your job.
It might be the other way around.
He may have a crush on you.
I will wait to hear from you, then.
Bodies like that are not something to be touched lightly.
If you are worried about bacteria, do not be.
The spirits of the deceased are drawn to corpses.
It is best not to touch them.
And she might belong to some noble somewhere.
I explained this before, did not I?
It was not in the dictionary.
I are not talking to no cop.
Do you know what happens to criminals who defile corpses?
Their limbs are cut off while they are still alive
before they are stuffed into a barrel filled with poison insects
and left there overnight, and then thrown into the Obiza swamp!
If you do not want that to happen to you, start talking about that coffin!
I thought you would do that...
A body of unknown origin, kept in a Semanian coffin.
suggest that she is a Semanian female.
Simultaneous signs of desiccation and aging.
It is a strange form of mummification that you do not see on Earth.
This is an archaeological examination that does not require autopsy.
Can you take a CT scan of the body?
We heard it was worth a lot, so...
Shield of law, protection of the war god.
